SQL.LOAD: SELECT PRODUCT_GROUP_ID, DEALER_ID, PRODUCT_GROUP_NAME, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY FROM elp_product_group WHERE product_group_id = :product_group_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT distinct pg.product_group_id, C.CODE || ' - ' || dealer_name DEALER, pg.product_group_name FROM elp_company c inner join elp_dealer edealer on c.company_id = edealer.company_id inner join elp_product_group pg on edealer.dealer_id = pg.dealer_id --dynamic_in_clause --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.LOAD_AVAILABLE_PRODUCTCODES_LIST:
SELECT PC.PRODUCT_CODE || ' - ' || RT.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, PC.PRODUCT_CODE, PC.PRODUCT_CODE_ID ID
FROM ELP_PRODUCT_CODE pc
FULL JOIN
(SELECT pgd.product_code_id FROM ELP_PRODUCT_GROUP pg INNER JOIN ELP_PRODUCT_GROUP_DETAIL pgd on pg.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = pgd.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID WHERE DEALER_ID = :dealer_id) T1 ON pc.product_code_id = T1.product_code_id
left join (select product_code_id, min(item_number) item_number from elp_item group by product_code_id) I ON PC.PRODUCT_CODE_ID = I.PRODUCT_CODE_ID left join elp_item it on I.product_code_id = it.product_code_id and I.item_number = it.item_number left JOIN ELP_RISK_TYPE RT ON it.RISK_TYPE_ID = RT.RISK_TYPE_ID where pc.dealer_id = :dealer_id and T1.product_code_id is null ORDER BY DESCRIPTION
SQL.LOAD_SELECTED_PRODUCTCODES_LIST: select distinct PC.PRODUCT_CODE || ' - ' || RT.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION, PC.PRODUCT_CODE, PC.PRODUCT_CODE_ID ID, PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID, PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_NAME from ELP_PRODUCT_CODE PC left join (select product_code_id, min(item_number) item_number from elp_item group by product_code_id) I ON PC.PRODUCT_CODE_ID = I.PRODUCT_CODE_ID left join elp_item it on I.product_code_id = it.product_code_id and I.item_number = it.item_number left JOIN ELP_RISK_TYPE RT ON RT.RISK_TYPE_ID = it.RISK_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN ELP_PRODUCT_GROUP PG on PC.DEALER_ID = PG.DEALER_ID INNER JOIN ELP_PRODUCT_GROUP_DETAIL PGD ON PG.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID = PGD.PRODUCT_GROUP_ID AND PGD.PRODUCT_CODE_ID = PC.PRODUCT_CODE_ID where PC.DEALER_ID = :DEALER_ID ORDER BY DESCRIPTION
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_product_group SET product_group_name = :product_group_name, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE product_group_id = :product_group_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_product_group ( product_group_id, dealer_id, product_group_name ) VALUES ( :product_group_id, :dealer_id, :product_group_name )
SQL.LOAD_PRODUCT_CODES: SELECT pc.product_code_id, pc.product_code, pc.description FROM elp_product_code pc WHERE --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY UPPER(pc.description)
